main event: A bright, fast-moving object was observed visually and by radar from the USS Hassayampa in the Philippines on May 5-7, 1965.
interesting points: The object was observed to change direction and speed abruptly, indicating intelligent control.
The object could not be tracked on radar, but was visually confirmed by multiple Navy personnel.
Other similar objects were observed on the radar, blinking in and out of existence, also indicating intelligent control.
The sighting lasted for approximately 3-4 hours over multiple days.
The report was considered reliable and no further investigation was planned at the time.
sighted object: one or more bright, fast-moving objects
witnesses: Navy personnel on the USS Hassayampa
